steps.name: following are the options on the the technical qualifications page:
I click on "WAMITAB or EPOC qualification" on the Upload technical management qualifications page
I click on "Continue" button
I am on the "WAMITAB or EPOC: upload evidence" page
I select pdf file to upload
I click on "Continue" button
I am on the Task list page
Upload documents is marked as completed

elements.name: As a user, I should be able to see error message when I do not upload a file and try to proceed

steps.name: the application has been launched

I am on the "Select a permit" page
I select a permit "SR2010-No-4"
I click on "Continue" button
I am on the Task list page
I click on the "Upload technical management qualifications" link
I am on the "What evidence of technical competence do you have?" page
